colorIdentity.description: List of all colors in card’s mana cost, rules text and any color indicator.

colorIndicator.description: List of all colors in card’s color indicator (a symbol showing the colors of the card). Usually found only on cards without mana costs and other special cards.

colors.description: List of all colors in card’s mana cost and any color indicator. Some cards are special (such as Devoid cards or other cards with certain rules text).

convertedManaCost.description: The converted mana cost of the card.

faceConvertedManaCost.description: The converted mana cost of the face of either half or part of the card.

hand.description: Starting maximum hand size total modifier. A plus or minus character preceeds an integer. Used only on Vanguard cards.

isReserved.description: Is the card on the MTG Reserved List? (If false, it is usually omitted.)

layout.description: Type of card layout. Can be {{code:normal}}, {{code:split}}, {{code:flip}}, {{code:transform}}, {{code:meld}}, {{code:leveler}}, {{code:saga}}, {{code:planar}}, {{code:scheme}}, {{code:vanguard}}, {{code:token}}, {{code:double_faced_token}}, {{code:emblem}}, {{code:augment}} or {{code:host}}. (If normal, it is usually omitted.)

life.description: Starting life total modifier. A plus or minus character preceeds an integer. Used only on Vanguard cards.

name.description: Name of the card. (If the card is in an Un-set and has multiple printings, a space and letter enclosed in parentheses, starting with (b), follows the name.)

names.example: ["Nicol Bolas, the Ravager","Nicol Bolas, the Arisen"]
names.description: Names of each face on the card. Meld cards are listed in the order of {{code:CardA}}, {{code:Meld}}, {{code:CardB}}.

printings.description: List of sets the card was printed in, in uppercase.

scryfallOracleId.description: A unique ID for this card’s oracle identity. This value is consistent across reprinted card editions, and unique among different cards with the same name (tokens, Unstable variants, etc).

side.description: Identifier of the side. Used on cards with multiple faces, such as {{code:flip}}, {{code:split}}, {{code:transform}} cards. Can be {{code:a}}, {{code:b}}, or {{code:c}}.

subtypes.description: List of card subtypes found after em-dash. ("Legendary Creature — Angel")

supertypes.description: List of card supertypes found before em-dash. ("Legendary Creature — Angel")

text.example: "Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)\nDeathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)"

type.description: Type of the card. Includes any supertypes and subtypes. ("Creature — Angel")

types.description: List of types of the card.

uuid.description: A universal unique id (v5) generated by MTGJSON. Each entry is unique.
